data.name: The Van Game Demo
data.detailed_description:
The Van Game is a retro styled epic road-trip around the USA. Discover over a dozen national parks the way they're meant to be seen, in glorious pixel-art! Keep your crew happy while you navigate Choose-Your-Own-Adventure encounters with police, Crazy Karens, and people mistaking you for being homeless. Play 7 different mini-games and manage your resources to stay on the road. Keep your customized van in shape, and remember, it's all worth it for those sweet #vanlife posts.

This is a demo of the full game, and is time limited to 4 days in-game. Enjoy and don't forget to wishlist the full game!

Key features:

  • 14 beautiful national parks to explore
  • 12 fun-filled illnesses including everyones favorite, dysentery!
  • 7 challenging mini-games
  • Manage your money, food, gas and more
  • Keep your crew happy or they might just abandon the van life
  • Upgrade and customize your van, your home away from home
  • Collect stamps in your park passport and maybe even learn a little

data.short_description: The Van Game is a retro styled epic road-trip around the USA. Manage your crew, maintain your van, and discover over a dozen national parks.
